item.title: How did I get here?
item.description: This was originally posted in June 2019, about 15 days after my bipolar diagnosis Trigger warning: Depression Like many bipolar individuals (or individuals living with bipolar disorder) I was misdiagnosed with clinical depression and anxiety at first. This is apparently very common, with a correct diagnosis of bipolar disorder on average taking a staggering 10 years! After my first diagnosis, my doctor put me on Zoloft. At first, things got a lot better.
